overview: After teenage ambulance driver Ernest Hemingway takes shrapnel in the leg during World War I, he falls in love with Agnes von Kurowsky, a beautiful older nurse at the hospital where he's sent to recover. Their affair slowly blossoms, until Hemingway boldly asks Agnes to be his wife and journey to America with him. Richard Attenborough directs this drama based on the real-life experiences of the famed novelist.
tagline: In war they found each other...In each other they found love...
cast: Sandra Bullock|Chris O'Donnell|Mackenzie Astin|Margot Steinberg|Alan Bennett
